title: Kyle Sandilands slams Nine bosses for replacing Karl Stefanovic with 'try-hard dudes' on Today
text:
Kyle Sandilands has taken a swipe at Channel Nine executives over their treatment of sacked Today show host Karl Stefanovic.

Speaking to News.com.au at the Radio Alive conference in Brisbane last Friday, the KIIS FM star boldly claimed that reinstating Karl is the only way to boost Today's dwindling ratings.

'If I was running Channel Nine, I would immediately add Karl to Georgie [Gardner] and Deb [Knight],' he said. 'I think Georgie and Deb are great, but they've got all these try-hard dudes in there.'

'If you put him back, everything is fixed!' Kyle Sandilands (left) has taken a swipe at Channel Nine executives over their treatment of sacked Today show host Karl Stefanovic (right)

Kyle, 48, explained that Karl, 45, should return as Today's 'main host', with Georgie and Deb as his co-hosts.

'You don't need to be a great programmer to realise that if you put Karl back, everything is fixed,' he said.

Karl was unceremoniously axed from the Today show in December last year while on his honeymoon in Aspen, Colorado.

Opinion: Kyle said that Deborah Knight (second from left) and Georgie Gardner (second from right) are 'great' but he doesn't like the other 'try-hard dudes' on the panel, possibly referring to newsreader Tom Steinfort (left). Pictured right: entertainment reporter Brooke Boney

In June, Karl spoke about his sacking at a Channel Nine event after the Logie Awards.

In a surprising admission, he told guests it was actually a 'relief' when he was finally given his marching orders by network bosses.

Karl explained that he had 'struggled' with the media scrutiny he had received in the months before his dismissal.

'Towards the end of last year, I was cooked': In the second half of 2018, Karl found himself in a whirlwind of negative publicity in the lead up to his wedding to Jasmine Yarbrough in Mexico

'Towards the end of last year, I was cooked,' he said, adding that the 'unwarranted' attention surrounding his personal life had taken its toll.

In the second half of 2018, Karl found himself in a whirlwind of negative publicity in the lead up to his wedding to shoe designer Jasmine Yarbrough in Mexico.

His popularity had been on a steady decline ever since he separated from his first wife Cassandra Thorburn in 2016, with female viewers turning their backs on him.
description: Kyle Sandilands has taken a stab at Nine bosses over their treatment of ousted Today show host Karl Stefanovic.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
